fields.Name: NPower Path2Tech Fullstack Developer Program
fields.Eligible Residents (Cities): ['Baltimore MD', 'Dallas/Fort Worth TX', 'Washington DC', 'New York City NY', 'Atlanta GA']
fields.Description: Empowering women to claim their space in tech, this accelerated, rigorous, fast-tracked, and fulfilling program prepares you to become a Full Stack Developer or Full Stack Software Developer in less than 6 months—come motivated, show up, be present, and put in the work!

fields.Name: Google Tech Equity Collective’s Tech Prep program
fields.Description: Tech Equity Collective Tech Prep is a holistic career development program designed to support Black professionals looking to transition into technical roles. Through live and on-demand coaching sessions, playbooks, and workshops, participants will be equipped with the know-how to successfully navigate their career transition. Whether you’re growing in your career or just starting out, Tech Prep provides resources to help you make that next bold career move in tech. TEC Tech Prep is specifically tailored for those interested in launching a career in software engineering, cybersecurity, or UX design.

fields.Name: Smoothstack Entry Level Software Engineer Apprenticeship
fields.Description:
Smoothstack hires veterans and active-duty staff serving in the reserve forces and custom-trains them in as little as 8 weeks.

Our HTD program jumpstarts a successful post-military IT career.

fields.Name: Ada Developers Academy Core
fields.Description: Ada Core is an 11-month program teaching full-stack web development with a practical focus. We cover Python, SQL, Flask, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React, and computer science fundamentals. Learn how to code, advocate for yourself in the industry, and cultivate your tech community.

fields.Name: YearUp: Application Development & Support, Data Analytics Training
fields.Eligible Residents (Cities): ['Los Angeles CA', 'San Jose CA', 'Wilmington DE', 'Chicago IL', 'Baltimore MD', 'Charlotte NC', 'Washington DC', 'Tampa Bay FL', 'San Francisco CA']
fields.Description: Year Up United's Data Analytics training curriculum offers young adults aged 18-29 essential skills in programming, databases, software development, and business intelligence. Our program introduces problem-solving techniques, database design, big data concepts, and data visualization, providing a solid foundation for a career in data analytics.

fields.Name: Adult Skills Academy at DAE
fields.Description: For students aged 18 or older. In this four-month Software Engineering intensive, students build multiple websites and apps, concluding with a capstone project of their choice. Students also develop critical skills to communicate their value to potential employers and investors.

fields.Name: The Knowledge House Innovation Fellowship
fields.Eligible Residents (Cities): ['Newark NJ', 'Atlanta GA', 'Washington DC', 'Los Angeles CA', 'New York City NY']
fields.Description: The Knowledge House launched the Innovation Fellowship in 2020. This program aims to serve adult job seekers from diverse backgrounds with little to no formal post-secondary educational experience and turn them into entry-level programmers, data analysts, cyber security analysts, and other entry-level roles in tech.

fields.Name: Resilient Coders Spring Software Engineering Cohort
fields.Description: The idea behind our bootcamp is a simple one. Introduce historically overlooked talent to object oriented programming and give them the tools they need to graduate as full-stack JavaScript developers so that they have access to sustainable high growth careers.

fields.Name: Code The Dream
fields.Description: Code the Dream offers free intensive training in software development to people from diverse low-income backgrounds though our free code school, CTD Learns. In our nonprofit dev shop, CTD Labs, our coders work with experienced mentors to hone their skills by building apps and technology platforms for a range of clients.
